name: identifier
label: Identifier
description: A unique proper name or character sequence that identifies this particular metabolomics assay. (EDAM:data_1083 )

name: belongsmetabolomicassay
label: Belongs metabolomic assay
description: This metabolomic analysis is part of a metabolomic assay. (SIO:000068 )

name: workflowdefinition
label: Workflow definition
description: File content or location that encapsulates the analysis workflow, i.e. a sequence of operations to achieve one or more objectives. (SIO:000127 )

name: workflowengine
label: Workflow engine
description: The engine used to execute the workflow such as Papermill, Jupyter, Galaxy or Nextflow. (NCIT:C48293 )

name: workflowpublished
label: Workflow published
description: A printed or electronic work offered for distribution. (NCIT:C48471 )

name: containerizedby
label: Containerized by
description: The analysis has been boxed by a container engine such as Singularity or Docker. (NCIT:C43186 )

name: softwaretools
label: Software tools
description: A general term primarily used for digitally stored data such as computer programs and other kinds of information read and written by computers. (ERO:0000071 )

name: parameters
label: Parameters
description: Any factor that defines a system and determines (or limits) its performance. (NCIT:C44175 )

name: dataformatsstored
label: Data formats stored
description: Which data file formats (i.e. defined ways or layouts of representing and structuring data in a computer file, blob, string, message, or elsewhere) are stored and potentially available. (NCIT:C142494 )

name: standardsused
label: Standards used
description: Any socially-agreed upon specifications used such as Common Workflow Language, mzML, ISA-TAB, FAIR Genomes, etc. (SIO:000618 )

name: statisticalmethodsapplied
label: Statistical methods applied
description: A method of analyzing or representing statistical data or a procedure for calculating a statistic, such as principal component analysis, affinity propagation clustering, T-test, etc. (NCIT:C19044 )
